attributes.action: bring in UK legislation at once to ban the use of bullbars on any UK registered vehicle
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present bullbars on existing vehicles are not illegal,even though the existence of a frontal bullbar doubles the chance of death when a pedestrian is hit.It is not illegal to import a vehicle fitted with a bullbar as original equipment.They are dangerous and almost entirely unnecessary, being only for macho display.It's a scandal that any driver thinks it worth keeping a lethally dangerous implement on their car.
